SELECT /* CommonCodeDao.allCodes */ J.cd_grp , A.cd , A.seq , A.cd_nm FROM sy_code A LEFT JOIN sy_code_group J ON A.cd_grp = J.cd_grp
AND A.use_yn = 'Y'
ORDER BY J.cd_grp, A.seq

SELECT /* CommonCodeDao.findCodesByCdGrp */ A.cd , A.seq , A.cd_nm FROM sy_code A
AND A.cd_grp = #{cdGrp} AND A.use_yn = 'Y'
ORDER BY A.seq ASC
